question:
Which of the following statements is/ correctly matched?
  1. Origin of the Universe - Nebular Hypothesis 
  2. Evolution of the Earth - The Big Bang theory 
  3. Evolution of the Moon - The Big Splat Theory 
select the the correct options from the code given below:
explanation:
The correct match is 
Origin of the Universe - Big Bang Theory 
Evolution of the Earth - Nebular Hypothesis 
Evolution of the moon - The Big Splat
